item.title: A Testimony of Courage: Just Say NO to SOGI, No Matter the Cost ft. Barry Neufeld [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ October 13, 2024
In this episode of Open Mike, Dr. Michael Thiessen interviews Barry Neufeld, a former school trustee from Chilliwack, BC, who has faced significant persecution for his Christian beliefs regarding gender ideology in schools. The conversation explores the implications of hate speech laws, the impact of gender ideology on families, and the role of the church in addressing these issues. Neufeld shares his personal experiences and the spiritual battle he believes is at the heart of the current cultural crisis. The episode serves as a call to action for Christians to stand firm in their beliefs and support those like Neufeld who are facing legal challenges for their convictions.

Episode Resources: Help Barry Fight Political Persecution: https://rightsandfreedoms.org/; Embattled former BC school trustee Barry Neufeld raising money for legal defence ahead of October trial | Western Standard: https://www.westernstandard.news/news/embattled-former-bc-school-trustee-barry-neufeld-raising-money-for-legal-defence-ahead-of-october-trial/58234.

item.title: Business, Tax Reform & Government: Matt Nunn for KY State Senator [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ October 05, 2024
In this episode of Open Mike, Dr. Michael Thiessen interviews Matt Nunn, a business owner and Republican nominee for state senator in Kentucky. They discuss Nunn's background, his experiences as a small business owner during COVID-19, and his views on economic challenges, immigration policies, and his political platform, which includes protecting the Second Amendment and addressing issues related to diversity, equity, and inclusion in education.

Episode Resources: Matt's Campaign Website: https://www.nunnforky.com/;
